title: FWD Total and Permanent Disability / Dismemberment Claim Form

fields.label: Policy Number
fields.summary: Write the policy number exactly as stated on your insurance documents.

fields.label: Name of Insured
fields.summary: Write Title, First, Middle, and Last Name of insured person.

sections.title: Section 1 – Attending Physician’s Association with Patient

fields.label: Regular Physician?
fields.summary: Tick Yes if you are the patient’s regular physician; otherwise No.

fields.label: Related to Patient?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, state the relationship.

fields.label: How long known?
fields.summary: Write how long you have known the patient (years/months).

fields.label: Date Disability/Illness/Accident Happened
fields.summary: Write date in MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Date First Consultation
fields.summary: Write when you first saw patient for this condition.

fields.label: Date Symptoms First Experienced
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY when signs/symptoms first appeared.

fields.label: Duration of Symptoms Before Consultation
fields.summary: Estimate how long symptoms were present before first consultation.

fields.label: Date of Diagnosis
fields.summary: Write date diagnosis was confirmed (MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: Details of Diagnosis
fields.summary: Describe full diagnosis and how illness/injury was sustained.

fields.label: Cause of Condition
fields.summary: Describe underlying cause of the condition.

fields.label: Alcohol/Drug Related?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide explanation.

fields.label: Objective Findings
fields.summary: Provide supporting results (histopath, X-ray, ECG, MRI, tests) with inclusive dates.

fields.label: If Accident – Affected Body Part
fields.summary: Describe body part/s affected by accident.

fields.label: Dismemberment/Loss of Function?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide details.

sections.title: Functional Capacity – Activities of Daily Living

fields.label: Move Bed to Chair/Wheelchair
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No if patient can move independently. If No, state duration.

fields.label: Move Indoors (room to room)
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If No, state duration.

fields.label: Use Lavatory / Manage Bowel & Bladder
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If No, state duration.

fields.label: Dress/Undress
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If No, state duration.

fields.label: Wash (bath/shower)
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If No, state duration.

fields.label: Feed Self
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If No, state duration.

fields.label: List Current Disabilities
fields.summary: List physical and mental/neurologic disabilities from illness/injury.

fields.label: Neurologic Classification
fields.summary: Tick Permanent or Temporary neurologic damage; explain evidence.

fields.label: Disability Classification
fields.summary: Tick Total & Permanent or Partial Disability; provide reasons/evidence.

fields.label: Physical Findings
fields.summary: Describe consciousness, behavior, motor function, gait, paresis/plegia.

fields.label: Mental/Neurologic Findings
fields.summary: Describe orientation, memory, language, cranial nerve involvement.

fields.label: Other Hospital/Physicians Referred
fields.summary: Provide names, hospitals, dates, and conditions consulted.

fields.label: Surgical Operations
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide type and date of operation.

fields.label: Treatments/Examinations/Procedures
fields.summary: List treatments (chemo, radio, dialysis, surgery, medications), dates, and number of sessions.

fields.label: Prognosis
fields.summary: State expected outcome of patient’s condition.

fields.label: Further Information
fields.summary: Provide any other details to assist claim assessment.

fields.label: Physician’s Name & Signature
fields.summary: Sign above printed name. Do not sign blank form.

fields.label: License No. & PTR No.
fields.summary: Write license number and PTR number.

fields.label: Field of Specialization
fields.summary: Write medical specialty.

fields.label: Clinic/Hospital Address
fields.summary: Write complete clinic or hospital address.

fields.label: Telephone/Mobile
fields.summary: Write contact numbers.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.summary: Write valid email address.

fields.label: Date Signed
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.
